boardgame.description: Okko is a miniature game that is played on a board with squares. It simulates skirmishes between Samurai and other typical Japanese-inspired characters (Ninjas, Geishas !!!) in the empire of Pajan. Each player controls from 4 to 6 characters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Okko is released as basis boxes containing the rules, adventure book, 6 double sided modular game boards, 10 special dice and 20 cardboard miniatures._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There are pewter miniatures (unpainted) to replace the cardboard minis included in this game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Okko is inspired from a comic published by _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Les Editions Delcourt_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; (French), _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Archaia Studios Press_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; (English) and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Silvester Strips_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; (Dutch), _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Carlsen Comics_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; (German)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Asmodée (ASM OK01US) In the year of 1108 of the official calendar of the Empire of Pajan. In this period of upheaval, commonly called the Era of the Asagiri, or Era of Mist, the Empire is torn apart by a civil war. Far from the battlefields, Okko, the masterless ronin, leading a small band of Demon Hunters, wanders throughout the lands of the Empire. He is followed by Noburo, a strange red-masked giant, and by mercenaries met during his travels. The empire hides in its midst many mysterious secrets, and the small band of adventurers will have to make the most of their guile in order to avoid falling into the many traps laid by the Oni Warau and other Evil Creatures. Okko, Era of the Asagiri, is a tactical game for two players using beautifully illustrated modular game tiles, with a large number of characters, cards and dice. Thanks to simple rules, you will be able to lead a group of Demon Hunter or control a clan of Evil Creatures. Gather you band, recuit mercenaries, choose your equipment and be a skilled tactician, for at the end of combat, there will be only one winner!
For Shedding for the winner Joe Thomoas. $16 plus shipping cost. Thanks

Asmodee (ASM OK01US)
In the year of 1108 of the official calendar of the Empire of Pajan. In this period of upheaval, commonly called the Era of the Asagiri, or Era of Mist, the Empire is torn apart by a civil war. Far from the battlefields, Okko, the masterless ronin, leading a small band of Demon Hunters, wanders throughout the lands of the Empire. He is followed by Noburo, a strange red-masked giant, and by mercenaries met during his travels. The empire hides in its midst many mysterious secrets, and the small band of adventurers will have to make the most of their guile in order to avoid falling into the many traps laid by the Oni Warau and other Evil Creatures. Okko, Era of the Asagiri, is a tactical game for two players using beautifully illustrated modular game tiles, with a large number of characters, cards and dice. Thanks to simple rules, you will be able to lead a group of Demon Hunter or control a clan of Evil Creatures. Gather you band, recuit mercenaries, choose your equipment and be a skilled tactician, for at the end of combat, there will be only one winner!

Asmodee (ASMOK01US) In the year of 1108 of the official calendar of the Empire of Pajan. In this period of upheaval, commonly called the Era of the Asagiri, or Era of Mist, the Empire is torn apart by a civil war. Far from the battlefields, Okko, the masterless ronin, leading a small band of Demon Hunters, wanders throughout the lands of the Empire. He is followed by Noburo, a strange red-masked giant, and by mercenaries met during his travels. The empire hides in its midst many mysterious secrets, and the small band of adventurers will have to make the most of their guile in order to avoid falling into the many traps laid by the Oni Warau and other Evil Creatures. Okko, Era of the Asagiri, is a tactical game for two players using beautifully illustrated modular game tiles, with a large number of characters, cards and dice. Thanks to simple rules, you will be able to lead a group of Demon Hunter or control a clan of Evil Creatures. Gather you band, recuit mercenaries, choose your equipment and be a skilled tactician, for at the end of combat, there will be only one winner!

Wer mit PayPal zahlt muss zusätzlich 3€ überweisen, aufgrund der entstehenden Transaktionsgebühren.
